definition: Han Han (1982-), PRC blogger, singer and professional rally driver
cold air current/cold ocean current/cold stream
to exchange conventional greetings/to talk about the weather
to defend against the cold/to keep warm
shiver all over though not cold/tremble with fear/shudder
to enquire solicitously about sb's well-being (idiom)/to pamper

sentences.english: He slipped and broke his leg during the big freeze last winter.
sentences.chinese: 寒期间他滑了一跤，跌断了腿。

sentences.english: Yan Liu gradually back heavy, Humilis cloud Lone Wild Goose far red winter sunset days.
sentences.chinese: 回头烟柳渐重重，淡云孤雁远，寒日暮天红。

sentences.english: 10th, Meng Xiangbin The wind whinny, the river water is cold, the brave soldier never to returns.
sentences.chinese: 风萧萧，江水寒，壮士一去不复返。

sentences.english: Cold stream stripping logging pecking, songbirds Liu Xiao cord quite high.
sentences.chinese: 伐木清溪寒剥啄，鸣禽高柳晓缗蛮。

sentences.english: Reed root flavour Kennedy sex cold, can clear away heat carambola.
sentences.chinese: 芦根味甘性寒，能清热生津。

sentences.english: It was a clod and rainy afternoon in winter.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个冬天下午的寒阴雨后。

sentences.english: Cold here, icy cold there. You belong to neither, leaves have with ered.
Fine words make winter warm, disagreeable ones make summer chilly.
sentences.chinese: 好言一句三冬暖，话不投机六月寒。

sentences.english: Health and the sea Ningbi cold, Shek Pik cut straight into the sea, rock Provisional Cliff Yan lying.
sentences.chinese: 大海凝碧生寒，石壁直削入海，磐石临崖偃卧。

sentences.english: Fang tracer gradually die winter cold.
Where to Go Xiren cross carp, as if the cold shadow on transit.
sentences.chinese: 昔人跨鲤归何处，彷佛中天月影寒。

sentences.english: According to Chinese nutrition, vegetables and fruits have “cold” energetic properties.
sentences.chinese: 从中国营养学来看，蔬菜水果是“寒”性的。

sentences.english: I spent my day on the wet cold dust of the road.
sentences.chinese: 我在大道上潮寒的尘埃里度过了一天。

sentences.english: Whose heart Is Chilling While Lin states stop heating ?
sentences.chinese: 林州停止供暖寒了谁的心？

sentences.english: The captain slid aside, his blade flashing.
sentences.chinese: 船长滑到一边，他的剑刃寒光闪闪。

sentences.english: Han Shanzi was a very important figure in terms of Buddhist poems.
sentences.chinese: 在僧诗创作历史上，寒山子是一个关键性人物。

definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
demonic/iniquitous/nefarious/evil/unhealthy influences that cause disease (Chinese medicine)/(coll.) strange/abnormal
emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream
Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
Lesser Cold, 23rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-19th January
Great Cold, 24th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 20th January-3rd February
to the bone/to the marrow/fig. to a very large degree
